exec: pm.test("Validates it has a body", function () {      pm.response.to.be.withBody; });pm.test("Validates that the body is json", function () {      pm.response.to.be.json; });pm.test("Validates created status", function(){    pm.response.to.have.status(201);});pm.test("Validates it has the property account_id", function() {    var body = pm.response.json();    pm.expect(body.account).to.have.property('account_id');});pm.test("Validates name value", function(){    var body = pm.response.json();    pm.expect(body.account.name).to.eq(pm.environment.get("email"));});console.log(pm.response);console.log(pm.response.code);console.log(pm.response.status);pm.environment.set('account_id', pm.response.json().account.account_id)

var body = pm.response.json();console.log(pm.response);console.log(pm.response.code);console.log(pm.response.status);pm.test("Validates it has a body", function () {      pm.response.to.be.withBody; });pm.test("Validates that the body is json", function () {      pm.response.to.be.json; });pm.test("Validates created status", function(){    pm.response.to.have.status(201);});pm.test("Validates it has the property action_type", function() {    pm.expect(body.action).to.have.property('action_type');    pm.expect(body.action.action_type).to.eq('new');});pm.test("Validates subject's value", function(){    pm.expect(body.ad.subject).to.eq('Juego de cucharones');});
